title: A GPL American scientist was forced to open NASA's phone by U.S. Customs and Border Protection?
subtitle: The New American World, Mr. Becknavar, confirmed that the Customs and Border Protection Bureau had seized his phone and demanded access to his stored data.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: The Office of Customs and Border Protection confiscated the New American World's telephone (Mr. Becknavar) and demanded access to its stored data.
